summary.professional: Experienced Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. Led teams of 5-10 developers and delivered projects serving 1M+ users.
summary.about: I'm a passionate developer who loves solving complex problems with elegant code. My journey started with a curiosity about how websites work, and evolved into a career building platforms that impact millions of users. When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open source or mentoring junior developers.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
achievements: Led development of microservices architecture serving 2M+ daily active users
Reduced page load time by 60% through React optimization and code splitting
Mentored 8 junior developers and conducted weekly code review sessions
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Built REST API handling 10K requests/second using Node.js and MongoDB
Developed real-time chat feature using WebSockets serving 50K concurrent users
Reduced infrastructure costs by 40% through AWS optimization
Implemented comprehensive test suite achieving 85% code coverage

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
achievements: Developed 15+ responsive websites for clients using HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Integrated third-party APIs including Stripe, Mailchimp, and Google Maps
Improved website accessibility scores from 60 to 95 on Lighthouse audits
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI components

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Built a full-featured e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and admin dashboard. Implemented advanced search with Elasticsearch and recommendation engine using collaborative filtering.
highlights: Processed $2M+ in transactions in first year
Reduced cart abandonment by 25% with optimized checkout flow

projects.title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a real-time analytics dashboard for monitoring application metrics, user behavior, and system health. Features interactive charts, custom alerts, and data export capabilities.
highlights: Displays data with sub-second latency for 100K+ data points
Reduced debugging time by 50% with comprehensive logging
Used by 200+ team members across organization

projects.title: Open Source UI Component Library
projects.description: Created and maintain a popular React component library with 50+ accessible, customizable components. Includes comprehensive documentation and Storybook demos.
highlights: 5K+ GitHub stars and 100K+ weekly npm downloads
98% test coverage with automated visual regression testing

articles.title: Optimizing React Performance at Scale
articles.excerpt: Deep dive into React performance optimization techniques including memoization, code splitting, and virtual DOM optimization for large applications.

articles.title: Building Microservices with Node.js
articles.excerpt: Comprehensive guide to designing, building, and deploying microservices using Node.js, Docker, and Kubernetes.

testimonials.quote: Jane is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality code. Her ability to architect scalable solutions and mentor junior developers makes her invaluable to any team.
testimonials.author: Michael Chen

testimonials.quote: Working with Jane was a game-changer for our startup. She built our entire platform from scratch and helped us scale to thousands of users. Her technical expertise and problem-solving skills are outstanding.
testimonials.author: Sarah Thompson

seo.title: Jane Developer - Senior Full Stack Developer | React, Node.js, AWS
seo.description: Experienced Full Stack Developer specializing in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. Building scalable web applications serving millions of users.
